availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas C. Judy (Powell County, Kentucky, farmer and county court clerk)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, farmer and county court clerk. Maryland native. Married to Elizabeth Judy. Father of Mary Ann Judy, Martha Judy, George H. Judy, Thomas C. Judy. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Powell County in 1860. Clerk of the Powell County Court from 1863 to 1869.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2, p. 42. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, p. 26. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, Precinct 2, Subdivision 144, p. 135. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1865 (Frankfort, KY: George D. Prentice, 1866), p. 12. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1867 (Frankfort, KY: John H. Harney, 1867), p. 356. D. Howard Smith, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1869 (Frankfort, KY: S. I. M. Major, 1869), p. 173. KYR-0001-029-0570.
